content: https://tuncoin.io/What is TunCoin?TunCoin is a cryptocurrency token created with the aim of launching our e-commerce platform based on web 3.0 technologies and which offers high quality products to its holders without any margin applied.Our primary innovations:The creation of an innovative Web 3.0 e-commerce corporation based fundamentally on Blockchain technology and smart contracts. NoMarkUp Corporation aims to sell and deliver voted and negotiated products for its customers. Our nomarkup.shop website will offer a different customer experience, each transaction is driven by a smart contract, at the slightest incident the customer is refunded immediately in full transparency. This is how we tend to innovate the next customer experience.White paper https://tuncoin.io/wp/white_paper_tuncoin_v1.pdfWe are currently in the pre-sales phase since 14/11. Join us!Our social networks :Twitter: https://twitter.com/TunCoin_OffiFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/TunCoin.officiel/Medium: https://medium.com/@tuncoin.offiTelegram: https://t.me/Tuncoin_officielTunCoin Team
